pr_title: Use explicit charset instead of default charset

timeline.message:
Use explicit charset instead of default charset

Implicit use of the platform default charset, which can result in differing behaviour between JVM executions or incorrect behavior if the encoding of the data source doesn't match expectations.

timeline.bodyText: ByteBufferBackingArray:  ByteBuffer.array() shouldn't be called unless ByteBuffer.arrayOffset() is used or if the ByteBuffer was initialized using ByteBuffer.wrap() or ByteBuffer.allocate().
